algref.Citable

    • Uses of Citable in images.mining.clustering

      Classes in images.mining.clustering that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IntraImageKMeansAdapted
      This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference.
      class  IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale
      This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference.
      class  IntraImageKMeansWeighted
      This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised

      Classes in learning.supervised that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Classifier
      This class implements the methods used for classifier training and testing.
      class  DiscreteClassifier
      This class implements the methods used for classifier training and testing on discretized data instances.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised.meta.boosting

      Classes in learning.supervised.meta.boosting that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdaBoostM2
      This class implements a classical multi-class boosting method AdaBoost.M2.
      class  BoostableClassifier
      This class extends the usual Classifier class by introducing the instance weighting options to be used in re-weightable boosting procedures.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised.meta.boosting.baselearners

      Classes in learning.supervised.meta.boosting.baselearners that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DWHFNNBoostable
      This paper implements the dwh-FNN algorithm that was proposed in the following paper: "Hubness-based Fuzzy Measures for High-dimensional K-Nearest-Neighbor classification" at MLDM 2011.
      class  HFNNBoostable
      This paper implements the h-FNN algorithm that was proposed in the following paper: "Hubness-based Fuzzy Measures for High-dimensional K-Nearest-Neighbor classification" at MLDM 2011.
      class  HIKNNBoostable
      This class implements the HIKNN algorithm that was proposed in the paper titled: "Nearest Neighbor Voting in High Dimensional Data: Learning from Past Occurrences" published in Computer Science and Information Systems in 2011.
      class  HwKNNBoostable
      This class implements the hw-kNN method for hubness-based instance weighting in kNN classification.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised.methods

      Classes in learning.supervised.methods that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RSLVQ
      This class implements the robust soft learning vector quantization classification method.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised.methods.discrete

      Classes in learning.supervised.methods.discrete that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DNaiveBayes
      This class implements the standard Naive Bayes classifier.
      class  DOneRule
      This class implements the trivial One-rule classifier that learns a one-level decision tree.
      class  DWeightedNaiveBayes
      This method implements the weighted version of the Naive Bayes classifier, that supports arbitrary instance weights.
      class  DZeroRule
      This class implements the trivial zero-rule classifier.
      class  KNNNB
      This class implements the k-nearest neighbor Naive Bayes algorithm, KNNNB, that learns a Naive Bayes model on the restriction of the data on the kNN set.
      class  LWNB
      This class implements the locally-weighted Naive Bayes algorithm, LWNB, that learns a Naive Bayes model on the restriction of the data on the kNN set.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised.methods.discrete.trees

      Classes in learning.supervised.methods.discrete.trees that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DCT_ID3
      This class implements the standard ID3 decision tree classification method.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.supervised.methods.knn

      Classes in learning.supervised.methods.knn that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AKNN
      This class implements the algorithm proposed in the paper "Improving nearest neighbor rule with a simple adaptive distance measure" published in Pattern Recognition Letters (2007) by Jigang Wang, Predrag Neskovic and Leon N.
      class  ANHBNN
      This class implements the Augmented Naive Hubness-Bayesian k-Nearest Neighbor method that was proposed in the following paper: Hub Co-occurrence Modeling for Robust High-dimensional kNN Classification, by Nenad Tomasev and Dunja Mladenic, which was presented at ECML/PKDD 2013 in Prague.
      class  CBWkNN
      An algorithm described in the paper titled "Class Based Weighted K-Nearest Neighbor over Imbalance Dataset" that was presented at PAKDD 2013 in Gold Coast, Australia by Harshit Dubey and Vikram Pudi the idea is to assign (query and class) - specific weights to instance votes.
      class  DWHFNN
      This paper implements the dwh-FNN algorithm that was proposed in the following paper: "Hubness-based Fuzzy Measures for High-dimensional K-Nearest-Neighbor classification" at MLDM 2011.
      class  DWKNN
      This class implements the distance-weighted extension of the basic k-nearest neighbor classifier.
      class  FNN
      This paper implements the classical fuzzy k-nearest neighbor algorithm.
      class  HFNN
      This paper implements the h-FNN algorithm that was proposed in the following paper: "Hubness-based Fuzzy Measures for High-dimensional K-Nearest-Neighbor classification" at MLDM 2011.
      class  HIKNN
      This class implements the HIKNN algorithm that was proposed in the paper titled: "Nearest Neighbor Voting in High Dimensional Data: Learning from Past Occurrences" published in Computer Science and Information Systems in 2011.
      class  HIKNNNonDW
      This class implements the HIKNN algorithm that was proposed in the paper titled: "Nearest Neighbor Voting in High Dimensional Data: Learning from Past Occurrences" published in Computer Science and Information Systems in 2011.
      class  HwKNN
      This class implements the hw-kNN method for hubness-based instance weighting in kNN classification.
      class  KNN
      This class implements the basic k-nearest neighbor classifier.
      class  NHBNN
      This class implements the Naive Hubness-Bayesian k-nearest neighbor algorithm that was proposed in the following paper: A Probabilistic Approach to Nearest-Neighbor Classification: Naive Hubness Bayesian kNN by Nenad Tomasev, Milos Radovanovic, Dunja Mladenic and Mirjana Ivanovic, presented at the Conference on Information and Knowledge Management (CIKM) in 2011 in Glasgow.
      class  NWKNN
      Implements the algorithm described in Neighbor-weighted K-nearest neighbor for unbalanced text corpus by Songbo Tan in Expert Systems with Applications 28 (2005) 667–671.
      class  PKNN
      This class implements the probabilistic KNN classification algorithm that was described in the paper titled "A probabilistic nearest neighbor method for statistical pattern recognition" that was authored by C.
      class  RRKNN
      This class implements the re-ranked k-nearest neighbor classifier, which performs hubness-aware re-ranking of the original kNN set and then performs voting by a subset of the original neighbors, the better ranked ones.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.unsupervised

      Classes in learning.unsupervised that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClusteringAlg
      This class implements the functionality for a clustering algorithm.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.unsupervised.methods

      Classes in learning.unsupervised.methods that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DBScan
      This class implements the well-known density based DBScan algorithm first proposed in the following paper: Martin Ester, Hans-Peter Kriegel, Jörg Sander, Xiaowei Xu (1996).
      class  FastKMeans
      A fast K-means implementation described in: Alsabti, Khaled, Sanjay Ranka, and Vineet Singh.
      class  FastKMeansPlusPlus
      A fast K-means implementation described in: Alsabti, Khaled, Sanjay Ranka, and Vineet Singh.
      class  GHPC
      Global Hubness-proportional Clustering that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
      class  GHPKM
      Global Hubness-proportional K-means that was analyzed in the following paper: Nenad Tomasev, Milos Radovanovic, Dunja Mladenic and Mirjana Ivanovic: The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data, IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering , Vol.
      class  GKH
      Global K-hubs Clustering algorithm that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
      class  HarmonicKMeans
      Clusterer that performs harmonic K-means.
      class  KernelGHPKM
      A kernelized version of the GHPKM algorithm, described in the following chapter: "Hubness-proportional clustering of High-dimensional Data" by Nenad Tomasev, Milos Radovanovic, Dunja Mladenic and Mirjana Ivanovic, published in "Partitional Clustering Algorithms" book in 2014.
      class  KernelKMeans
      This class implements the kernel K-means algorithm, a kernelized version of the well-known partitional clustering approach.
      class  KMeans
      Clusterer that performs K-means.
      class  KMeansPlusPlus
      Clusterer that performs K-means++.
      class  KMedoids
      Clusterer that performs K-medoids.
      class  KMedoidsPlusPlus
      Clusterer that performs K-medoids.
      class  LHPC
      Local Hubness Proportional Clustering that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
      class  LKH
      This class implements the Local K-Hubs algorithm that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.unsupervised.methods.multithreaded

      Classes in learning.unsupervised.methods.multithreaded that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MTFastKMeans
      A fast K-means implementation described in: Alsabti, Khaled, Sanjay Ranka, and Vineet Singh.
      class  MTFastKMeansPlusPlus
      A fast K-means implementation described in: Alsabti, Khaled, Sanjay Ranka, and Vineet Singh.

    • Uses of Citable in learning.unsupervised.tests

      Classes in learning.unsupervised.tests that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KMeansHubnessTester
      Tracks the localization of hubs and medoids in K-means iterations.

    • Uses of Citable in preprocessing.instance_selection

      Classes in preprocessing.instance_selection that implement Citable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Carving
      This class implements the carving instance selection method based on calculating the HM scores in Hit-Miss networks with subsequent refinement, as proposed in the paper titled 'Class Conditional Nearest Neighbor and Large Margin Instance Selection' by E.
      class  CNN
      A class that implements the condensed nearest neighbor rule for instance selection.
      class  ENRBF
      This class implements the edited normalized RBF noise filter that can be used for instance selection.
      class  GCNN
      Implements the instance selection algorithm described in the paper: The Generalized Condensed Nearest Neighbor Rule as A Data Reduction Method (2006)
      class  HMScore
      This class implements the instance selection method based on calculating the HM score in Hit-Miss networks, as proposed in the paper titled 'Class Conditional Nearest Neighbor and Large Margin Instance Selection' by E.
      class  INSIGHT
      INSIGHT: instance selection algorithm designed for the time-series domain, but general in principle, described in the PAKDD 2011 paper by Krisztian Buza INSIGHT scores the points and selects the top points according to a hubness- based goodness/badness score.
      class  InstanceSelector
      IMPORTANT: InstanceSelector should not change the ordering of the elements.
      class  IPT_RT3
      RT3 algorithm proposed in "Instance Pruning Techniques", 1997, a highly cited paper on the topic.
      class  IterativeCaseFiltering
      This class implements the iterative case filtering (ICF) approach that was first proposed in the paper titled 'Advances in Instance Selection for Instance-Based Learning Algorithms' by Henry Brighton and Chris Mellish in DAMI in 2002.
      class  RandomSelector
      Random instance selection.
      class  RNNR_AL1
      This class implements an AL1 instance selection rule that was described in the paper: Dai, B.R., Hsu, S.M.: An instance selection algorithm based on reverse nearest neighbor.
      class  Wilson72
      This class implements an old baseline algorithm described in the paper: Asymptotic Properties of Nearest Neighbor Rules Using Edited Data.
